Articles.Content:
Yes and no. Maybe? Or maybe not?

User below me eats Uranium for breakfast and Plutonium for dinner.

How did you know ?!!!

The user below me believes "camping" is the only way to win in "Call of Duty"

Canpimg ish 4 dah winnerz.

The user below me can count from 1 to yellow.

Yellow is not a number, unless you mean 3 (which is a yes).

The next user can confuse the user below him.

Yes

The next use will disagree.

I am not a use.

The user below me wishes he could be Jebediah.

Yah.

The user below me enjoys rubbing mayonnaise on their bodies at night while everyone else is asleep.

Toothpaste is much better.

User below me remembers me a year ago.

I do from my times as Lurker

The user below me is trained in a form of martial arts

Why yes I am! Poke Fu!

The user below me cut the wrong wire.

*head asplodes*

User below me is the owner of the broken time machine from the future that has a piece of it retrieved by the present era people in which have called it the "Antikythera Mechanism".

false

the user below me likes trains

kinda

the user below lives in the bay area.

Nope.

Next user likes dubstep.

No.

The user below me likes the Beatles. (If you don't I will punch you)

Half n' half. Like some but not all of the songs.

The user below me likes Rockcooles avatar.

Too... slim...

The next user is not slim.

True. Well, medium slim.

The next user is a brony. Pinkie Pie iz bst poneh.

No

The next user likes fish

To eat. Yes.

The user below me is mad with power.

No, I'm quite happy when I have power.

The user below me is a uranium-based lifeform.

Nope, silicon. 10 points for anyone who can name the alien race! xD

The user below me has copper based blood. Same deal as above.

False, impossible, and never. Carbon-based and water-based life forms are more common. (I mean BOTH, so deal with it!)

The next user is a carbon-based and water-based life form.

true

The user below me is an intelligent shade of the color blue

no green

the user below me likes germany
